Our England (2022)
England's women's football team, the Lionesses, aims for glory in the UEFA Women’s Euro 2022, and they've recruited a director and illustrator to make it a sticker-filled trip down nostalgia lane. Because, you know, we all fondly remember those panini stickers from our youth.

videos.alt_text: A$AP Rocky - Kids Turned Out Fine
videos.title: A$AP Rocky - Kids Turned Out Fine (2019)
videos.description: Directed by Dexter Navy, A$AP Rocky's "Kids Turned Out Fine" music video explores the transition from childhood to parenthood through surreal and dreamlike scenes, accompanied by a blissed-out vibe. Despite a dark twist related to the album title "TESTING," the video maintains a whimsical feel and highlights Rocky's psychedelic wardrobe.
videos.additional_info:

videos.title: Volkswagen - Diamonds (2022)
videos.description: The 2022 Volkswagen commercial "Diamonds" features a series of touching life moments involving various individuals and families with their Volkswagen cars, metaphorically highlighted by visuals of diamonds to represent the preciousness of these times. The commercial combines a warm, cinematic aesthetic with an emotional soundtrack, emphasizing the car as a key companion in life’s special journeys, celebrating and enhancing these valuable experiences.
videos.additional_info:
Volkswagen - Diamonds (2022)
The 2022 Volkswagen commercial "Diamonds" features a series of touching life moments involving various individuals and families with their Volkswagen cars, metaphorically highlighted by visuals of diamonds to represent the preciousness of these times. The commercial combines a warm, cinematic aesthetic with an emotional soundtrack, emphasizing the car as a key companion in life’s special journeys, celebrating and enhancing these valuable experiences.

videos.title: Dua Lipa - Training Season (2024)
videos.description: In the "Training Season" video, Dua Lipa remains composed at a cafe, surrounded by gawking men taking photos of her. The song's inspiration, as shared by Lipa, stemmed from a series of bad dates, leading her to declare the end of her "training season" and shaping the song with songwriters Caroline Ailin and Tobias Jesso Jr.

Created by agency Wieden+Kennedy, Portland.
videos.additional_info:

Created by agency Wieden+Kennedy, Portland.
Technique - Set Transition

Editor - Rock Paper Scissors

videos.title: The French Dispatch (2021)
videos.description: A love letter to journalists set in an outpost of an American newspaper in a fictional twentieth century French city that brings to life a collection of stories published in "The French Dispatch Magazine".
videos.additional_info:
The French Dispatch (2021)
A love letter to journalists set in an outpost of an American newspaper in a fictional twentieth century French city that brings to life a collection of stories published in "The French Dispatch Magazine".
Technique - 1960s , Set Transition , Void
Director - Wes Anderson
DOP - Robert Yeoman
Editor - Andrew Weisblum
Colorist - Gareth Spensley

videos.title: Fantastic Mr. Fox (2009)
videos.description: An urbane fox cannot resist returning to his farm raiding ways and then must help his community survive the farmers' retaliation.
videos.additional_info:

Director - Wes Anderson

videos.title: Lazy Susan (2019)
videos.description: You might be one of the millions of people whose life was made a little bit easier by Susan and you don’t even know it. Shot breakdown: Overhead tracking shot.
